desc: A Fruit Salad Tree is a fruit tree that grows up to 6 different fruits all on the 1 tree. They are multi-grafted trees. Stonefruit, Citrus and Apple Trees. Order online and enjoy delivery Australia wide. Fruit Salad Trees are great gifts for Christmas, Fathers Day, Mothers Day, Valentines Day, birthdays and memorials.

layout.text: Grow different fruits on one tree!
